verses.roman:
kulīna-grāmī bhakta āra yata khaṇḍa-vāsī
ācārya śivānanda sane mililā sabe āsi'

synonyms: kulīna-grāmī—residents of the village known as Kulīna-grāma; bhakta—devotees; āra—and; yata—all; khaṇḍa-vāsī—the residents of Śrī Khaṇḍa; ācārya—Advaita Ācārya; śivānanda—Śivānanda Sena; sane—with; mililā—met; sabe āsi',—all coming together.
translation: Thus all the devotees of Kulīna-grāma and Śrī Khaṇḍa, as well as Advaita Ācārya, came together to meet Śivānanda Sena.
